input_text:
Job Title: Junior Fullstack Software Engineer

Location: New York, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
This inclusive employer is a member of myGwork – the largest global platform for the LGBTQ+ business community.  

We are on the lookout for a Junior Fullstack Engineer to join our growing engineering team. This role provides an exceptional chance to immerse yourself in web development, contributing to both the front and back ends of our web application. You'll be part of a skilled team, crafting clean code with the latest technologies and participating in the entire software development lifecycle.

As a Junior Fullstack Software Engineer in our engineering team, you will have an exceptional chance to immerse yourself in web development, contributing to both the front and back ends of our web application. You'll be part of a skilled team, crafting clean code with the latest technologies and participating in the entire software development lifecycle. This role provides an opportunity to develop high-quality code for our web application using TypeScript, React, Node.js, Go, Java, and other modern tools, and to collaborate on feature planning and implementation across the full stack.

Job Responsibilities

Develop high-quality code for our web application using TypeScript, React, Node.js, Go, Java, and other modern toolsCollaborate on feature planning and implementation across the full stackEngage in sprint planning, retrospectives, and technical roadmap discussionsEnsure seamless feature integration from development to production in collaboration with designers and product managersAdhere to coding, testing, and deployment best practices

Required Qualifications, Capabilities And Skills

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent experience1+ year of software development experience or demonstrable contributions to a private or open source software projectProficiency in JavaScript, React, and/or backend development in Node, Go, or JavaSolid grasp of web development fundamentals like HTML, CSS, REST, and APIsEagerness to learn new technologies and frameworksYou are empathetic, curious, and pragmatic

Preferred Qualifications, Capabilities And Skills

Experience with TypeScript, Redux, Chakra UI, NextJS, GraphQL, or similar technologiesFamiliarity with the Agile development process and experience participating in sprints and team meetingsExperience in writing tests and ensuring code quality through continuous integration and deployment practices

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Junior Fullstack Software Engineer
output_json.summary: Join our growing engineering team as a Junior Fullstack Engineer, contributing to both front and back ends of our web application.
preferred_degrees: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field
job_responsibilities: Develop high-quality code for web application using TypeScript, React, Node.js, Go, Java, and other modern tools
Collaborate on feature planning and implementation across the full stack
Engage in sprint planning, retrospectives, and technical roadmap discussions
Ensure seamless feature integration from development to production in collaboration with designers and product managers
Adhere to coding, testing, and deployment best practices
output_json.company_information: Inclusive employer, member of myGwork, largest global platform for the LGBTQ+ business community.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Employer is inclusive and a member of myGwork.
